articles.author: Anjali Marar
articles.title: Pune’s NCRA scientists obtain detailed solar images in radio frequency using MeerKAT - The Indian Express
articles.description: Instead of the conventional method, the NCRA team pointed the MeerKAT radio telescope, located in South Africa's Karoo desert, towards a region located at a small distance away from the Sun.
articles.content: A team of solar physicists at Pune-based National Centre for Radio Astrophysics Tata Institute of Fundamental Research (NCRA-TIFR) has obtained detailed images of the Sun in the radio frequency, whic… [+2911 chars]
